title: Miro
description: Miro is a full-featured digital whiteboard, it can be used to run all kinds of design exercises, including design sprints. You also use it to build simple prototypes.

title: FigJam
description: FigJam by the same team as Figma, is another popular choice as a collaborative whiteboard for teams. It can also be used to build simple prototypes.

title: Google Meet
description: The free version of Google Meet is great for communicating with the sprint team. The company tier includes screen recording and other features that are useful for user testing.

title: Zoom
description: Zoom is another video conferencing app that is full of useful features for user testing, like recording and closed-captioning.

title: Figma
description: Figma is an excellent choice for building and testing prototypes, including high-fidelity prototypes with animation, video and audio.

title: Webflow
description: If you need to build a prototype quickly for the web, using HTML and CSS, Webflow is a great choice to move faster than hand-coding from scratch.

title: usertesting.com
description: Sometimes it's difficult or time consuming to find users to test with, usertesting.com makes finding and testing with users easy, and almost completely automated.
